name: open-abap-odata
description: OData shims for Node.js and Steampunk

scripts.unit: rm -rf output && abap_transpile && echo RUNNING && node --expose-gc output/index.mjs && echo OK
scripts.steampunk:files: rm -rf steampunk_input && mkdir steampunk_input && cp -r src/* steampunk_input && cp test/test1/*.clas* steampunk_input && cp test/test1/zsegw.tabl.xml steampunk_input && rm steampunk_input/*cl_sodata_http_handler.clas.abap
scripts.steampunk: npm run steampunk:files && npm run steampunk:rename && npm run steampunk:lint
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit && mocha test/mocha.mjs
